metadata.title: CVE-2021-36980 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Open vSwitch (aka openvswitch) 2.11.0 through 2.15.0 has a use-after-free in decode_NXAST_RAW_ENCAP (called from ofpact_decode and ofpacts_decode) during the decoding of a RAW_ENCAP action.

notes.note: mdeslaur> per Google, this was introduced in 418a7a84245f5fbe589dd1267463fc9ba27a1dd6

criterions.comment: openvswitch package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.15.0-0ubuntu3.1').
